title: Tim Gettys Promposal To Gia (w/ The Bachelor's Alexis Waters & Wells Adams)
description:
Come to Kinda Funny Prom 2018! http://KindaFunny.com/tickets

HUGE SHOUT-OUT TO ALEXIS WATERS AND WELLS ADAMS FOR HELPING OUT WITH THIS PROMPOSAL!!!!

Follow them here:
https://twitter.com/awatazzz
https://twitter.com/WellsAdams


Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com

transcript_chunks.text: what's up guys kind of funny prom is happening June 30th it's coming up fast you can get your tickets at kind of funny calm slash tickets but the most important thing after you get those tickets is you need a date and you're gonna get a dates you need to do a promposal and of course I had to do that for Gia so I was thinking about it and I knew the Bachelorette premiere was coming up and if you know gia Harris you know she loves the bachelor bachelorette bachelor in paradise Cinematic Universe so we had a bunch of people over to our place to watch the premiere of The Bachelorette and I decided to hit up a couple of Gia's favorite bachelor contestants Alexis waters and Wells Adams to make a video message to her to kind of you know T me up to ask the question will you go to prom with me ah I took those videos I added a couple commercials before them and what I did was edited together the YouTube video that while we were watching the premiere when the commercials came on I switched it

I took those videos I added a couple commercials before them and what I did was edited together the YouTube video that while we were watching the premiere when the commercials came on I switched it over to the other video she had no idea what was coming and then she saw this special message oh hey I didn't see you there as doing those Bachelor contemplative shots anyways uh Jean Harris heard your big bachelor fan hello gia Harris this is Alexis waters here I love you thank you for all your support I heard your big bachelor fan that's kind of sad anyways most importantly Tim Geddes has a question for you take it away oh yeah [Music] thank you so much to Alexis and Welles for helping me out there everybody out there I want to see your prom wholesome please hit up at Joey Noel on Twitter with hashtag KF prom with you asking your girlfriend/boyfriend loved one summer whoever it is to prom - kind of funny prom I want to see all of you guys there well if we if we like the videos we might

hashtag KF prom with you asking your girlfriend/boyfriend loved one summer whoever it is to prom - kind of funny prom I want to see all of you guys there well if we if we like the videos we might watch them on the kind of funny morning show that'd be a lot of fun for everybody but until then I love you [Music]
